title: Begging For A Coup, Ben Shapiro IS Hollywood 1.5.21
itunes:title: Begging For A Coup, Ben Shapiro IS Hollywood 1.5.21
description:
In episode 784, Jack and Miles are joined by American Hysteria podcast host Chelsey Weber-Smith to discuss the second stimulus check, the Georgia runoff election, Trump's call to the Georgia Secretary of State, Ben Shapiro coming to Hollywood, Hilaria Baldwin, Bean Dad, Dunkin's extra charged coffee, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Second stimulus check: IRS says the $600 payments are now on their way. But how soon is now?
  2. The latest on Georgia runoff and Trump's bid to overturn the election
  3. Here’s the full transcript and audio of the call between Trump and Raffensperger
  4. ‘I just want to find 11,780 votes’: In extraordinary hour-long call, Trump pressures Georgia secretary of state to recalculate the vote in his favor
  5. Trump’s Phone Call Is What Coup Fever Looks Like
  6. The Daily Wire Makes First Foray Into Film & TV With School Shooting Movie ‘Run Hide Fight’; Right-Wing Site Developing Two TV Series
  7. WATCH: 6 times Hilaria Baldwin’s dubious Spanish accent has gone wrong on camera | Page Six Celebrity News
  8. Unpacking the Drama Around Hilaria Baldwin’s Accent
  9. Ken Jennings Defends Co-Podcaster John Roderick Amid "Bean Dad" Controversy
  10. The Story Behind Dunkin’s Extra Charged Coffee
  11. WATCH: GAZZILLION EAR - MF DOOM, J Dilla

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
